title: 1978 26’ Utility Semi Trailer (Contents NOT Included)
item_description:
1978 26’ Utility Semi Trailer (Contents NOT Included)

Trailer Details

  • Year: 1978
  • Make: Utility
  • VIN: 7L81729001
    • Per DMV No VIN record on file
  • Gross Vehicle Weight Rating (GVWR): 37,000 Lbs

Dimensions

  • Overall Length: 318”
  • Overall Width: 96”
  • Overall Height: 158”
  • Deck Length: 314”
  • Deck Width: 93”
  • Side Height: 104”
  • Width Between Fenders: 93”

Axles, Brakes, and Tires

  • Suspension: Leaf Spring
  • Number of Axles: 1
  • Brake Type: Air
  • Number of Wheels: 4
  • Tire Size: 10.00 R 22
  • Electric Plug Type: 7-Way Round
  • Hitch: 5th Wheel

Removal Note: This lot is only available for removal on Friday, February 21, 2025, from 9:00AM to 3:30PM. Earlier removal of this lot will not be permitted. Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of removal of this lot. No loading assistance or assistance of any kind will be provided by West Auctions. Please bid accordingly.

Note:  This item is being sold on behalf of an estate to clear off of the property. This item either had one of the following categories; 1) No identification was found on the frame, or 2). The ID or license plate found was verified with the California DMV where no record was found. Therefore the buyer will receive a Bill of Sale only, which will be mailed 1-2 weeks after removal. Buyer is fully responsible for the new registration process, transfer, fees, and inspections due to DMV to register this item in the Buyer's name if they so choose to obtain a new title/VIN/License/registration.
